name: Hunger & Mayhem
description:
The year is 2217. Space vagrant Mintsy Flare takes to the new frontier to escape the grip of corporations and society. The life of a space-age bounty hunter is all too enticing until she learns what it will take from her...

Play as the beat-punk bounty hunter, Mintsy Flare, in this Stealth-Action adventure! Blast through intense gunfights against ruthless mercenaries, or sneak past them altogether. Choose your approach to hostile encounters as you hunt the bounty on Hank The Cannibal, the galactic fugitive. Will you claim your prize, or be ultimately consumed?

Also contains an arcade mode with 3 unique stages. Select from a number of loadouts as you infiltrate hostile environments.
